Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • db_package.CompanyDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    This class is Company DAO-layer that uses for speaking with DB and relevant tables.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrey Orlov
